tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE leaderboard (
    leaderboard_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    region_id INT,
    achievement_id INT,
    points_earned INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES region(region_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (achievement_id) REFERENCES achievements(achievement_id)
);
CREATE TABLE regions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, region_name STRING NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE players (id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_name STRING NOT NULL, region_id INT NOT NULL, achievements INT NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE leaderboard (id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_id INT NOT NULL, region_id INT NOT NULL, rank INT NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE cities (id INT PRIMARY KEY, city_name STRING NOT NULL, region_id INT NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE achievements (id INT PRIMARY KEY, achievement_name STRING NOT NULL, points INT NOT NULL);
